an2.310-479:4.1: “For insight into greed, two things should be developed.
an2.310-479:4.4: For insight into greed, these two things should be developed.”
an2.310-479:5.1: “For the complete understanding … finishing … giving up … ending … vanishing … fading away … cessation … giving away … letting go of greed, two things should be developed.”
an2.310-479:7.1: “Of hate … delusion … anger … hostility … denigration … insolence … envy … stinginess … deceit … manipulation … obstinacy … aggression … conceit … arrogance … vanity … negligence … for insight … complete understanding … finishing … giving up … ending … vanishing … fading away … cessation … giving away … letting go … two things should be developed.
an2.310-479:7.4: For the letting go of negligence, these two things should be developed.”
an2.310-479:8.1: This is what the Buddha said.
an2.310-479:8.2: Uplifted, the mendicants approved of what the Buddha said.
an2.310-479:10.1: The Book of the Twos is finished.
